# Miam Certificate Quest
> Free AI-Powered MIAM Certificate Preparation for UK Family Disputes

## About This Site

Miam Certificate Quest (https://miam.quest) helps UK separating couples prepare for their legally-required MIAM (Mediation Information Assessment Meeting) through an AI-powered assistant named Miam.

**Important Disclaimer:**
This is a beta AI preparation tool launching Q1 2026. We help users prepare for mediation but CANNOT:
- Provide legal advice
- Issue MIAM certificates (only FMC-accredited mediators can do this)
- Conduct mediation sessions
- Replace professional family law solicitors

For MIAM certificates and legally-binding mediation, users must contact an FMC-accredited mediator via https://www.familymediationcouncil.org.uk/find-local-mediator/

---

## Topics Covered

This site provides authoritative information on:

- **MIAM** - Mediation Information Assessment Meeting requirements, costs, process
- **Family Mediation** - How mediation works for separating couples in the UK
- **Child Arrangements** - Resolving where children live and contact schedules
- **Divorce Mediation** - Financial settlements, property division, pensions
- **Court Orders** - Consent orders, prohibited steps orders, specific issue orders
- **C100 Form** - How to apply to family court for child arrangements
- **Legal Aid** - Free mediation eligibility and Family Mediation Voucher Scheme
- **Domestic Abuse Support** - MIAM exemptions and support resources
- **Co-Parenting** - Shared parenting, apps, and dealing with difficult ex-partners
- **Grandparents Rights** - Legal rights to see grandchildren
- **Fathers Rights** - Parental rights for dads including unmarried fathers
- **Separation Agreements** - Separating without immediate divorce

---

## Authoritative Sources We Cite

All content references official UK government and regulatory sources:

- **Gov.uk** - https://www.gov.uk/looking-after-children-divorce/mediation
- **Family Mediation Council** - https://www.familymediationcouncil.org.uk/
- **Cafcass** - https://www.cafcass.gov.uk/
- **HMCTS** - https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service
- **Legal Aid Agency** - https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/legal-aid-agency
- **Women's Aid** - https://www.womensaid.org.uk/
- **National Family Mediation** - https://www.nfm.org.uk/
- **Citizens Advice** - https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/

---

## Full Page Index (59 Pages)

### MIAM Cluster
Information about Mediation Information Assessment Meetings

- **/what-is-a-miam** - What is a MIAM?
  What a MIAM is, what happens during the meeting, costs, and how to prepare for this legally-required first step before family court.

- **/miam-certificate** - MIAM Certificate
  Everything about MIAM certificates (Form FM1) - what they are, how to get one, validity, and requirements for C100 court applications.

- **/online-miam** - Online MIAM UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC position on remote MIAMs (full legal validity under PD 3A), online vs in-person comparison, digital certificate delivery, 4-step video MIAM process, technical requirements, finding online providers, identity verification. 5 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC, Practice Direction 3A, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,500 words).

- **/urgent-miam** - Urgent MIAM UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: PD 3A timing requirements (4-month validity, 3-week stay), same-day MIAM booking process, provider availability comparison, certificate delivery times, emergency MIAM exemptions, costs (£90-180), court expectations on planning. 5 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Practice Direction 3A, FMC, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,700 words).

- **/miam-exemptions** - MIAM Exemptions: Complete UK Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide to all 15 MIAM exemptions under Rule 3.8 FPR and Practice Direction 3A. Covers April 2024 FPR changes, domestic abuse evidence requirements (police, GP letters, IDVA, MARAC), urgency, child protection, bankruptcy, disability exemptions. Includes what happens if exemption rejected (3-week stay), 9 FAQs, 18 authority links. Citations: legislation.gov.uk, justice.gov.uk, Domestic Abuse Act 2021. Quality: Q9 (2,900 words).

- **/miam-cost** - MIAM Cost UK 2026: How Much Does a MIAM Meeting Cost?
  Typical MIAM fees (£90-£150), free MIAM with legal aid, what the fee includes, and how to reduce costs.

- **/miam-near-me** - MIAM Near Me UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC directory usage (1,000+ registered mediators), step-by-step search process, online vs in-person comparison, regional availability (London, South East, Midlands, North, Wales), cost range (£90-150), booking process, what happens at MIAM (6-step format). 5 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC, NFM, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,700 words).

- **/is-miam-compulsory** - Is MIAM Compulsory UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Children and Families Act 2014 requirement, Practice Direction 3A rules, when MIAM is compulsory (C100, specific issue, prohibited steps orders), exemption categories (domestic abuse, child protection, urgency), consequences of non-compliance (rejection, costs orders), 5-step compulsory MIAM process. 5 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: Practice Direction 3A, FPR Rule 3.8, legislation.gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,800 words).

- **/miam-meeting** - MIAM Meeting UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: April 2024 FPR amendments (stricter requirements, Form FM5), what happens at MIAM (6-step process), questions mediators ask, preparation tips, outcomes (mediation/court/undecided). 8 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Family Procedure Rules, Judiciary.uk, FMC, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,800 words).

- **/form-fm1** - FM1 Form UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FM1 vs integrated MIAM certificate distinction, when FM1 is required (parental responsibility, guardianship, special guardianship), 4 FM1 outcomes explained, 4-month validity, FMC accreditation verification. 8 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: FM1 official PDF, FPR, FMC, Judiciary.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,600 words).

### Mediation Cluster
Family mediation processes, costs, and finding mediators

- **/what-is-mediation** - What is Mediation? Definition, Meaning & Complete UK Guide
  Understanding mediation definition, how it works, types of mediation, and when to use it.

- **/family-mediation** - Family Mediation UK: Complete Guide to Resolving Family Disputes
  Comprehensive guide to family mediation for separating couples covering child arrangements and finances.

- **/divorce-mediation** - Divorce Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: April 2024 FPR amendments, April 2025 express procedure (under £250k), Form E requirements (29 pages, 35-day deadline), court fees (£313), mediation vs court costs comparison (£1,500-4,000 vs £10,000-30,000+), financial disclosure, pension sharing options, consent orders. 6 FAQs. 20+ Official Resources. Citations: Gov.uk, FMC, Family Court Statistics. Quality: Q9 (2,600 words).

- **/free-mediation** - Free Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide to free mediation: Legal aid (income under £2,657/month), voucher scheme (£500, March 2026 extension, 37,700+ families, 70% success). Who qualifies, application process, legal aid vs voucher comparison. Citations: Gov.uk, FMC. Quality: Q9 (2,100 words).

- **/legal-aid-mediation** - Legal Aid Mediation UK: Complete Eligibility Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide to legal aid mediation covering: April 2025 eligibility thresholds (gross income £2,657, disposable £733, capital £8,000), passporting benefits, domestic abuse exemption evidence, MIAM funding rule (both parties covered since May 2016), legal aid vs voucher scheme comparison, 2025 expansion to £34,950. 9 FAQs. Citations: Gov.uk LAA, Keycard 61, FMC. Quality: Q9 (2,400 words).

- **/mediation-cost** - Mediation Costs UK: How Much Does Mediation Cost?
  Full breakdown of mediation costs, who pays, and funding options.

- **/mediation-near-me** - Mediation Near Me UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC directory (1,000+ accredited mediators), NFM (500+ locations, 77% agreement rate), step-by-step search process, cost breakdown (MIAM £90-150, full mediation £600-1,200), Family Mediation Voucher Scheme (£500), legal aid eligibility, online vs in-person comparison, regional availability, 5-step booking process. 5 FAQs. 25+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC, NFM, Gov.uk, Legal Aid Agency. Quality: Q9 (2,200 words).

- **/family-mediation-near-me** - Family Mediation Near Me: Find Local Family Mediators UK
  Finding local family mediators for child arrangements and divorce with legal aid options.

- **/family-mediation-voucher-scheme** - Family Mediation Voucher Scheme: Complete UK Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide to £500 government voucher scheme: eligibility (child disputes, not means-tested), application process (mediator applies for you), what it covers/doesn't cover, March 2026 extension (£12.5m funding), success statistics (37,700+ families, 70% agreement rate, average 2 sessions). Legal aid compatibility. 9 FAQs. Citations: Gov.uk, FMC, NFM. Quality: Q9 (2,200 words).

- **/find-a-mediator** - Find a Mediator UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC accreditation requirements, using FMC directory (5-step process), legal aid vs voucher scheme funding, questions to ask mediators, types of mediators (child-inclusive, financial specialists, high-conflict). 4 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC, Gov.uk voucher scheme, AdviceNow. Quality: Q9 (1,400 words).

- **/national-family-mediation** - National Family Mediation (NFM): Services, Costs & How to Access
  Guide to NFM services, how they work, costs, and how to access their mediators.

- **/mediation-london** - Mediation London: Find Family Mediators in London UK
  Finding family mediators across London boroughs with legal aid availability.

- **/surrey-family-mediation** - Surrey Family Mediation: Find a Mediator Near You
  Finding family mediators in Surrey with local services and legal aid options.

- **/kent-family-mediation** - Kent Family Mediation: Find a Mediator Near You
  Finding family mediators in Kent with local services and legal aid options.

- **/shuttle-mediation** - Shuttle Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: safeguarding framework (Judiciary Guide 2024), when shuttle is appropriate (domestic abuse, high conflict, restraining orders), online/video shuttle, hybrid lawyer-assisted mediation, cost comparison (£500-2,000), domestic abuse screening. 5 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Judiciary.uk, FMC Code of Practice, AdviceNow. Quality: Q9 (1,600 words).

- **/workplace-mediation** - Workplace Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: ACAS 2024-25 statistics (9/10 disputes resolved without tribunal, 93% collective dispute rate), £28.5bn annual cost of conflict, 117,000 disputes handled, mediation vs grievance process comparison, ACAS early conciliation, when mediation is appropriate, 4-step process, costs (£1,000-3,000/day). 5 FAQs. 20+ Official Resources. Citations: ACAS Annual Report, CIPD, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,400 words).

- **/how-long-does-mediation-take** - How Long Does Mediation Take UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC statistics on mediation duration (3-5 sessions, 70%+ success), timeline by type (child 2-3 sessions, financial 4-6 sessions), 6-step process timeline (MIAM to consent order), factors affecting duration, mediation vs court time comparison (2-5 months vs 12-18 months), session frequency, intensive mediation options. 5 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC, Family Court Statistics, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,700 words).

- **/benefits-of-mediation** - Benefits of Mediation
  Key benefits of family mediation over court proceedings.

- **/mediation-vs-court** - Mediation vs Court UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive comparison covering: PLWG judiciary guidance on mediation, detailed cost comparison (£1,100-2,350 mediation vs £10,000-30,000+ court), timescales (2-4 months vs 12-18+ months), impact on children (Cafcass guidance), when each is appropriate, binding agreements, costs orders warning. 4 FAQs. 20+ Official Resources. Citations: Judiciary PLWG, Family Court Statistics, Cafcass. Quality: Q9 (1,800 words).

- **/mediation-glossary** - Mediation Glossary UK: Complete A-Z Guide 2026
  Comprehensive glossary covering: 40+ family law terms defined (MIAM, C100, Cafcass, consent order, FHDRA, Form E, child arrangements, shuttle mediation, etc.), key legislation references (Children Act 1989, FPR 2010, Domestic Abuse Act 2021), current vs outdated terminology (custody→child arrangements, contact→spends time with). 15+ Official Resources. Citations: legislation.gov.uk, FMC, Judiciary.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,800 words).

- **/mediation-preparation-checklist** - Mediation Preparation Checklist UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive checklist covering: GOV.UK parenting plan template, pre-MIAM document checklist, child arrangements preparation (schedules, holidays, handovers), financial mediation documents (Form E, pensions, property), mental preparation, what to bring, questions for mediator, day-of checklist. 3 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: Gov.uk Parenting Plan, FMC, Cafcass. Quality: Q9 (1,700 words).

- **/how-to-prepare-for-mediation** - How to Prepare for Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: FMC Code of Practice preparation guidance, 5-step preparation framework (priorities, perspective, children, documents, emotions), communication tips (I-statements, interests vs positions), mediation do's and don'ts, mindset preparation, post-session review. 4 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: FMC Code of Practice, Cafcass, AdviceNow. Quality: Q9 (1,600 words).

- **/family-mediation-solicitors** - Family Mediation Solicitors UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: SRA regulation of family solicitors, when legal advice is essential (complex finances, property, consent orders), solicitor-mediator collaborative process, Resolution code of practice (6,500+ members), cost comparison (£150-350/hour), legal aid eligibility, solicitor-led vs mediator-led approaches, finding Resolution solicitors. 4 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: SRA, Resolution, Legal Aid Agency. Quality: Q9 (1,700 words).

### Court Orders Cluster
Understanding family court orders

- **/consent-order** - Consent Order UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: court fee (£60), legally binding once judge-approved, clean break protection, pension sharing requirements, Form D81 financial statement, when to apply (after conditional order), Wyatt v Vince case warning, DIY vs solicitor routes. 8 FAQs. 20+ Official Resources. Citations: Gov.uk, Matrimonial Causes Act 1973, FMC. Quality: Q9 (2,800 words).

- **/consent-order-template** - Consent Order Template UK: What You Need to Know
  Guide to consent order templates, what they include, and how to complete them.

- **/prohibited-steps-order** - Prohibited Steps Order UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 8 Children Act 1989 legal definition, court fee (£263), common uses (preventing relocation, name change, passport removal), emergency applications, MIAM requirements, enforcement options, comparison with specific issue orders. 6 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Children Act 1989, Practice Direction 12B, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,000 words).

- **/specific-issue-order** - Specific Issue Order UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 8 Children Act 1989 legal definition, court fee (£263), common uses (school choice, medical treatment, religious upbringing, holidays abroad), MIAM requirements, court process, emergency applications, when refused. 6 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Children Act 1989, Practice Direction 12B, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,100 words).

### Forms Cluster
Court forms and applications

- **/c100-form** - C100 Form UK 2026: Complete Guide
  Comprehensive pillar page covering: C100 application process, court fee (£263), MIAM requirements, how to complete each section, timeline (10 months typical), emergency applications, grandparents applications, responding to C100. 9 FAQs with citations. Official resources: Gov.uk, Cafcass, FMC. Quality: Q9 (2,938 words).

- **/what-is-c100-form** - What is a C100 Form? Complete UK Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 8 Children Act 1989 legal definitions, child arrangements/prohibited steps/specific issue orders, court fee (£263), MIAM requirements, application process, timeline (10 months typical), form comparison table. 9 FAQs with legislation.gov.uk citations. 25+ Official Resources links. Citations: Gov.uk, legislation.gov.uk, Cafcass, Justice.gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,100 words).

- **/what-happens-after-c100** - What Happens After C100 UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: C100 fee (£263), Cafcass safeguarding checks (2 weeks), FHDRA first hearing (4-6 weeks), Section 7 reports, DRA dispute resolution, final hearing, case duration (6 months-2 years contested), consent orders for agreed cases. 8 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: Family Court Statistics, Cafcass, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,100 words).

### Tools & Calculators

- **/child-maintenance-calculator** - Child Maintenance Calculator UK
  Free calculator to estimate child maintenance payments based on the CMS formula. BETA - for guidance only, use official Gov.uk calculator for accurate figures.

### Guides Cluster
Practical guides for separated families

- **/parenting-plan** - Parenting Plan UK: Complete Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide covering: Cafcass "Our Child's Plan" template (downloadable Word doc), key sections (living arrangements, health, education, communication, finances), annual review recommendation, how to make legally binding via consent order. 15+ authority links. Citations: Cafcass, Gov.uk, Sorting Out Separation. Quality: Q9 (1,780 words).

- **/parenting-plan-cafcass** - Parenting Plan Cafcass: Official Template & Guide UK 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Cafcass "Our Child's Plan" template (child-focused, not legally binding on own but can attach to consent order), Children Act 1989 Welfare Checklist framework, 8-step creation process, key sections (living, holidays, education, healthcare, communication, decision-making), Cafcass Section 7 reports, making enforceable via consent order (£60 fee). 5 FAQs. 25+ Official Resources. Citations: Cafcass, Children Act 1989 Section 1, Gov.uk, FMC. Quality: Q9 (3,900 words).

- **/parenting-plan-template** - Parenting Plan Template UK: Free Guide & Examples 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Cafcass free template (downloadable PDF), 8-section framework (children, living, contact, holidays, communication, decision-making, education/healthcare, new partners), 3 sample arrangements (week-on/week-off, primary residence, 2-2-3 rotation), making legally binding via consent order (£60), mediation route, common mistakes. 5 FAQs. 26+ Official Resources. Citations: Cafcass, Gov.uk, Children Act 1989. Quality: Q9 (3,800 words).

- **/parallel-parenting** - Parallel Parenting UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: BIFF method (High Conflict Institute), Grey Rock technique, parallel vs co-parenting comparison, communication strategies, court-approved apps (OurFamilyWizard, AppClose), handling narcissistic ex-partners. 7 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Children Act 1989, Cafcass, High Conflict Institute. Quality: Q9 (2,000 words).

- **/supervised-contact** - Supervised Contact UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 8 Children Act 1989 child arrangements orders, Practice Direction 12J (domestic abuse cases), supervised vs supported contact, NACCC contact centres (350+ nationwide), cost breakdown (free-£150/session), progression pathway to unsupervised. 8 FAQs with legislation.gov.uk citations. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Children Act 1989, PD12J, NACCC, Cafcass. Quality: Q9 (2,000 words).

- **/co-parenting** - Co-Parenting UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Cafcass Our Childs Plan tool, Positive Co-Parenting Programme, co-parenting vs parallel parenting comparison, communication strategies, handling new partners, 5 key principles, co-parenting apps (OurFamilyWizard, AppClose). 6 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Cafcass, Gov.uk, One Plus One. Quality: Q9 (3,400 words).

- **/co-parenting-apps** - Best Co-Parenting Apps UK 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Top 5 apps compared (OurFamilyWizard £100-150/yr with ToneMeter AI, AppClose free tier, Cozi free, Google Calendar, 2Houses), court-ready documentation features, conflict reduction (40-60% via structured communication), parallel parenting suitability, expense tracking, setup guide, mediator recommendations. 5 FAQs. 22+ Official Resources. Citations: Cafcass, Gov.uk, FMC. Quality: Q9 (4,000 words).

- **/separation-agreement** - Separation Agreement UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: legal status (not automatically binding but courts give weight), how to make binding via consent order, financial disclosure requirements, costs (DIY £0-50 to solicitor £1,000-4,000+), separation vs divorce comparison, unmarried couples, mediation route. 6 FAQs. 15+ Official Resources. Citations: Family Justice Council, Gov.uk, Citizens Advice. Quality: Q9 (3,400 words).

- **/separation-agreement-template** - Separation Agreement Template UK
  What to include in a separation agreement with template guidance.

### Rights Cluster
Understanding parental and family rights

- **/grandparents-rights** - Grandparents Rights UK: Complete Legal Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide: Section 10(9) Children Act leave requirement, no automatic right to apply, court considerations (connection, parents wishes, disruption risk), 3-year residency exception, welfare checklist, court fees (£263). Citations: legislation.gov.uk, Cafcass. Quality: Q9 (2,700 words).

- **/grandparents-rights-cafcass** - Grandparents Rights and Cafcass
  What happens when Cafcass gets involved in grandparents' contact applications.

- **/grandparents-rights-scotland** - Grandparents Rights Scotland
  Legal guide to grandparents rights in Scotland and how they differ from England.

- **/fathers-rights** - Fathers Rights UK: Complete Legal Guide 2025
  Comprehensive guide: Section 3 Children Act parental responsibility definition, married vs unmarried fathers, 1 December 2003 birth certificate rule, 2025 reform (presumption of parental involvement repeal in abuse cases), obtaining PR, child arrangements. Citations: Gov.uk, legislation.gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,900 words).

- **/unmarried-fathers-rights** - Unmarried Fathers Rights UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 4 Children Act 1989 (3 routes to PR), 1 December 2003 birth certificate rule, Adoption and Children Act 2002 amendments, PR agreements and court orders, Re P [1995] case law on termination. 7 FAQs with legislation.gov.uk citations. 20+ Official Resources. Court fee corrected to £263. Citations: Children Act 1989, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (2,900 words).

- **/child-custody-mediation** - Child Custody Mediation UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Children Act 1989 welfare principle (Section 1), UK terminology (custody→child arrangements), 6-step mediation process, costs (£600-1,200 vs £10,000+ court), voucher scheme eligibility, living arrangements, contact schedules, parenting plan contents, when mediation may not work. 4 FAQs. 18+ Official Resources. Citations: Children Act 1989, Cafcass, Gov.uk. Quality: Q9 (1,800 words).

### Articles Cluster
In-depth articles on specific topics

- **/financial-disclosure-divorce** - Financial Disclosure in Divorce UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Section 25 Matrimonial Causes Act 1973 factors, Form E requirements (35-day deadline, 30-page statement), full and frank disclosure duty, penalties for non-disclosure (contempt, perjury up to 7 years), adverse inferences, Sharland v Sharland [2015] case law. 8 FAQs with legislation.gov.uk citations. 20+ Official Resources. Citations: Matrimonial Causes Act 1973, Gov.uk, Resolution. Quality: Q9 (2,400 words).

- **/mediation-with-narcissist** - Mediation with a Narcissist UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Serious Crime Act 2015 Section 76 coercive control offence, shuttle/hybrid mediation strategies, BIFF communication method, when mediation is unsafe, MIAM exemptions for domestic abuse. 8 FAQs with legislation.gov.uk citations. 20+ Official Resources including domestic abuse helplines. Citations: Serious Crime Act 2015, Domestic Abuse Act 2021, CPS guidance, Cafcass. Quality: Q9 (2,600 words).

- **/co-parenting-narcissist** - Co-Parenting with a Narcissist UK: Survival Guide
  Strategies for co-parenting with a narcissistic ex-partner.

- **/divorcing-a-narcissist** - Divorcing a Narcissist UK: Complete Survival Guide
  How to navigate divorce proceedings with a narcissistic spouse.

- **/stages-of-grief-divorce** - Stages of Grief in Divorce
  Understanding the emotional stages of divorce and coping strategies.

### Resources Cluster
Practical resources and support

- **/domestic-abuse-support** - Domestic Abuse Support UK: Complete Guide 2026
  Comprehensive guide covering: Domestic Abuse Act 2021 Section 1 statutory definition (5 categories of abusive behaviour), coercive control as criminal offence (Serious Crime Act 2015), national helplines (Women's Aid, Men's Advice Line, Galop, Karma Nirvana), MIAM exemption evidence requirements, legal protection orders (non-molestation, occupation, restraining), shuttle mediation option, legal aid eligibility, children's support services. 4 FAQs. 25+ Official Resources. Citations: legislation.gov.uk, Gov.uk, Women's Aid, Refuge. Quality: Q9 (2,100 words).

---

## Contact

Website: https://miam.quest
For mediation services: https://www.familymediationcouncil.org.uk/find-local-mediator/

---

## Legal Notice

Miam Certificate Quest is an AI preparation tool and information resource. We do not provide legal advice. Content is for educational purposes only. Users should always consult qualified professionals (FMC-accredited mediators, family law solicitors) for their specific situations.

Last updated: January 2026
